message: Big congratulations to our very own Lauren, who with ther team at uSwitch has earned their site the Plain English 'Crystal Mark'. http://blog.uswitch.com/2011/04/13/proud-to-speak-plain-english/ User-friendly content FTW!
Woohoo! Go me, etc etc. My ego has been over-massaged today. Very excited about it though and preparing myself for all the hard work we need to do to keep it.
